But what is her role in this? Cheerilee pondered over whether she should be the predator or be the prey. If she is the predator, she needs to take responsibility over the young pony’s life, while trying to teach the other students. Plus, she cannot give interactive commentary while swallowing a pony or throwing the pony back up.

If she is the prey, it may give the predator pony, being such a young filly/colt, quite a big discomfort and a nasty stomachache. She has a potion for that purpose of helping the pony to swallow, but she still feels rather uncertain about it.

What will Cheerilee do?

14122121.content:
Cheerilee may not have been a unicorn, the ponies most suited for delicate work, but she had the equipment and materials to make her electronic devices and make them liquid-proof. The fact that she had the tiny components needed for her experiment was not any indication that she'd planned this out well in advance, but rather Cheerilee was friend's with Nurse Redheart and was able to get a discount price on medical equipment that was being replaced--such as cameras that could go into the stomach with Cheerilee.

With her devices and her potions at the ready, Cheerilee was complacent that, with a few careful chosen words, the school day would go as planned. She was sure she'd thought of all the pertinent details. So she strolled into class with her saddlebags carefully packed with her equipment and began setting up a tv monitor with some old vcr equipment and a somewhat aged computer. The class were filing into the room and pestering Cheerilee about what she was doing, some hoping that they would be watching a movie today.

"No, but we do have an exciting day ahead of us!" she said and stepped away to look at her connections. She tested her camera and found a magnified version of her head on the television screen. She kept the little camera on the desk for now, along with the receiver.

"Hello children, welcome back to another fun day of learning!"

The class groaned. Cheerilee glared a little. "Now class... I would like to talk to you all about your recent test scores."

That got them quiet. The entire class looked nervous and snuck each other looks of horror. "We're sorry Cheerilee..." some of them mumbled, perhaps expecting the whole class to say it in unison.

"I don't think we're at the point where taking away your recess privileges or having an emergency parent teacher conference is needed," said Cheerilee. It was a good thing they didn't know that she herself was on the chopping block... "But we all need to work much much harder from now on."

"We will," most of them said. Cheerilee wasn't yet convinced.

"I'm going to be working harder too. I love to teach you, my little fillies. I do! So I worked extra hard on our lesson for today. You all might know that we're supposed to be covering the digestive tract today. I thought of a way that will make sure that everyone learns today, and remembers it, because this won't be a lesson you'll forget!"

The class looked puzzled and gave each other curious looks. Some of them were excited.

"Today we'll be seeing the digestive tract from the inside!" said Cheerilee.

The class gasped. "But how're you gonna dooth that Mth Cheerilee?" asked Twist.

Now the hard part. Cheerilee forced a big smile. "One of you is going to swallow me."

The class looked horrified. "What in tarnation?" Apple Bloom shouted and stood up at her desk. "No! No no no Ms. Cheerilee you can't! We dun want you to die jus'in so we get better grades!"

Cheerilee giggled. "Oh Apple Bloom I assure you that I will be in no danger--and neither will the pony who eats me. I've got a variety of potions that pretty much cover, well, everything you can think of that can go wrong!"

"But why would you want to do some so grody? Ewww!" Diamond Tiara said.

Cheerilee lifted her leg and pointed her flank at them. "Well it is my calling! Now then, would anypony like to volunteer?"

141221211221.content:
Apple Bloom and Scootaloo were the most shocked as Sweetie Belle turned to the face the class, a little smile on her face.

"What are you doing?" asked Scootaloo.

"Well why not?" asked Sweetie Belle. "I don't want to lose recess do you? Plus, Ms. Cheerilee is so sweet and kind, I bet she'd be really tasty."

Cheerilee gave a little cough. She was embarrassed and a little bit disturbed by Sweetie Belle's comment. "Well thank you Sweetie Belle."

"You're welcome!" Sweetie Bell chimed.

"Alright class, now first I need you to tell me what you know about how the digestive tract starts!" said Cheerilee.

The class shifted uncomfortably. Cheerilee felt a little dark horror in her. How could they--? "Uhh well first ya gotta eat somethin'," said Apple Bloom.

Oh thank Celestia, at least it was an answer. "Yes that's right," said Cheerilee. "But actually the digestive system is pretty complex, and digestion itself actually starts in the mouth. Anypony care to guess how?"

"It starts with your saliva!" Sweetie Belle said, and everyone turned to look at her. She wasn't often the most clever of ponies, but she was not only correct, but demonstrating for them all by drooling over her chin.

Cheerilee blinked. Sweetie Belle must be really excited. "Umm yes. Now, in order to digest your food properly, you have to chew it. Your saliva has enzymes that mix with your food and help break it down into simple sugars. This is most effective on starch, which is why crackers change to a sweeter flavor the longer they stay in your mouth. Chewing your food is more than just making it easier to swallow, although it certainly does that. However, I'm sure most of you have guessed by now that I won't be getting chewed up."

"Because you're going to shrink yourself down so I can get you in one little bite right?" asked Sweetie Belle.

Cheerilee stared. She hadn't even considered that. "Oh... Oh no. Um. I've got something else in mind. I suppose I could send you out to recess while I got something that would shrink me, but..."
141221211221.title: Sweetie Belle!

choices: Cheerilee proceeds to feed herself to Sweetie Belle.
1412212112212.content:
"We have a lot to do today and we should get started," said Cheerilee. "I already have a potion for you that will help you swallow me."

"But you're more than twice as big as her," said Scootaloo.

"Oh well more for me I guess," said Sweetie Belle. "So how do I eat you?"

Cheerilee pulled her potions out of her saddle bag, keeping the Ipecac imitation inside her bag. She set out the two bottles for Sweetie and herself. "This red one is for you Sweetie Belle. It stimulates saliva production, although it doesn't seem like you need that..."

Sweetie grinned and in doing so a trail of drool poured out between her lips.

"It will also relax and numb your throat muscles, allowing the esophagus to stretch easily. When you drink it, it will also coat your esophagus and act as a lubricant, allowing me to be swallowed easier, since your esophagus won't be strong enough to pull me down on its own. This other potion is for me. When I consume it, it will make my body sweat a counter-enzyme that prevents me from being digested. It will also increase my ability to survive in low oxygen conditions."

She frowned. "You all do still remember why ponies need oxygen right?"

"Oh yeah." "Sure!" "Of course Ms. Cheerilee." "Uhhhh...."

Cheerilee didn't get a chance to see who the "uhh" came from. She smiled again and uncorked the bottles. "Let's get started!" Sweetie Belle drank her potion and Cheerilee drank hers. As usual with potions, they started working practically the second that they hit the stomach. Sweetie Belle was now literally unable to control her drooling.

"Um Ms Cheerilee?' Sweetie Belle asked, spilling saliva from the corners of her mouth on the s. She tried to keep the drool from pouring out of her mouth, but she soon discovered it would be impossible to talk otherwise. "I... I'm not goin' to drown am I?"

"You'll be fine dear," said Cheerilee. She was busy fastening her camera to her head and applied the reciever to her ear. She turned her equipment back on and tested the audio. She could hear herself just fine from the television.

"Okay Sweetie Belle, are you ready?" asked Cheerilee.

Sweetie Belle nodded.

"Okay class, get ready to take notes," said Cheerilee. "Sweetie Belle, open your mouth wide and say ahhh~"
1412212112212.title: ... but they've got a lot to cover today, s...

14122121122121.content:
"Ahhh!"

Cheerilee knew that ponies could open their mouths impressively wide, but she wasn't expecting this. Sweetie Belle's mouth was already wide enough to take in her head and shoulders. Putting that kind of strain on the jaw would normally push the tongue up over the start of the esophagus, but the relaxed muscles were wide and gaping and she could easily see a few inches straight down into the gloomy, mucus-covered throat. The thick, slimy lubricant from her potion glistened. Cheerilee gulped and turned on the light for her camera, which shined down into Sweetie Belle and illuminated her throat further. Cheerilee thought she could see all the way down to the sphincter that separated the esophagus from the stomach.

"Well, children..." began Cheerilee nervously. With another careful poke from her hoof her camera let out a little laser pointer. "Here is, um... the tonsils, which are a non-essential part of your body's immune system. Some of you might have had these removed. And here is the uvula. Its function is to help seal your nasal cavity from food and liquid. And... there is the epiglottis. Write that word down please."

She started to get her confidence back.

"Now children the epiglottis is a very important part of your body. It seals your windpipe and keeps water, food, and other contaminants from entering your lungs when you are eating and drinking. Like a lot of your body's internal muscles, it acts on its own without you having to think about it."

"AHHHHH!!" Sweetie Belle sounded and stuck her mouth forward. Cheerilee took a step back and realized that Sweetie Belle was getting impatient. Her stomach growled. The teacher could see Sweetie's saliva running right down her esophagus, the epiglottis closing occasionally and demonstrating well Cheerilee's lesson on it. The saliva pooled against the ring of muscle separating esophagus from stomach, only for that muscle to open up and let the liquid drain in.

"And... stomach growls children are... rather simple to understand... They're actually caused by your digestive tract reshaping itself to eliminate excess space, which is why it growls then you are hungry."

Sweetie Belle's stomach growled again and the filly began to stomp her hooves. She was apparently very hungry. The potion was stimulating her appetite and making her desperate for Cheerilee.

"Okay okay fine!" Cheerilee yelled and stuffed her hooves into Sweetie Belle's mouth, and instantly the filly gulped them into her throat. The class gasped loudly. They had maintained a certain disbelief for their lesson until now. Sweetie Belle swallowed again, and Cheerilee stumbled forward. Sweetie Belle's throat was so slippery on the inside, like olive oil on a slip-and-slide (an event that had occurred on school grounds and had been rather messy to clean up). In her stumble, Cheerilee's face fell into Sweetie Belle's maw, and with her momentum and shifted center of gravity, she slipped easily into those relaxed muscles and wedged her entire head into Sweetie Belle's esophagus. The filly's bulging throat had a startling amount of detail of Cheerilee's face. The teacher was just big enough inside the small filly that, despite lubrication, there was enough friction to momentarily slow her descent, but Sweetie Belle began to gulp as fast as she could, and inch by inch, Cheerilee was disappearing into marshmallow-white unicorn.

Sweetie Belle was being very noisy, hmming and licking over Cheerilee's belly while she ate. Apparently Cheerilee was indeed very tasty. The filly was beginning to drool more and more, but with the big meal in her mouth obstructing her saliva from flowing down into her stomach, it poured out onto the floor and was forming a large puddle that rapidly spread towards the desks. Half the class still stared in horror at the scene in front of them, some other ponies, such as Apple Bloom and Twist, were still trying to write down notes and kept switching their vision from the television screen and the cannibalistic act occurring in front of them.

The muscle leading into the stomach opened up. Cheerilee and the class stared into it, and the light showed the pink muscle interior well. Cheerilee's faced pressed inside, and then into the stomach wall. Her entire head was more than enough to fill Sweetie Belle's stomach far beyond the volume it had ever contained before, and yet the muscle gave way elastically to the school teacher. Sweetie's eager slips closed around Cheerilee's cutie marks as her tongue curled up around Cheerilee's rump and gave a push. The slimy throat allowed Cheerilee's lower body to slip into Sweetie Belle with ease, and with so much weight and gravity to assist it, not even the tiny throat's constriction applied enough friction to stop Cheerilee from falling straight into that tummy in an instant. Cheerilee was forced to curl into a ball; the act of doing so pulled her own hooves down Sweetie Belle's throat without the filly even having to do anything. Sweetie Belle was so shocked that she hadn't closed her mouth, or her throat muscles, even after her stomach's entrance closed tight and purse to contain its meal. Sweetie Belle turned her face downward and saw her stomach was so full that she was unable to reach the ground with her own legs. Cheerilee was resting on the small of her back, and a slight twitch from her caused Sweetie Belle to suddenly fall down onto her side.

A stunned silence fell over the room. Some of the ponies began to grasp for air, having held it while watching the scene unfold.

"I didn't know you had it in you," Scootaloo laughed, breaking the tension.

"Help! I can't get UUUUUURRP!" Sweetie burped. The class began to giggle and a few, Sweetie's friends included, got from their desks to go check on Sweetie Belle and listen to her tummy, poking Cheerilee.

Cheerilee found herself in an even more cramped space without the extra air, but her uneven, non-homogenized shape maintained some air in her space, both good for air, and of course for talking. "Children? Can you hear me?" she asked. Her voice was muffled through Sweetie Belle's stomach, but she came over clear on the television.

"Yes Ms. Cheerilee!" they chimed.

"Okay, good," she heard. So many voices speaking unison was easy to hear even through the padding of flesh surrounding her. "Then we'll continue with our lesson."

141221211221211.content:
Cheerilee began her core lesson. She showed how the flesh secreted acids and enzymes to digest her, with the sweat she was making acting as a base to counter the acid. She explained the concept of an enzyme, that it could act as a catalyst that triggered chemical reactions to separate compounds from one another, dissolving food. Acid alone would take hundreds of years to do to a chocolate bar what these enzymes could do in a few hours. The class listened, taking notes, but still were uneasy as they feared for Cheerilee's safety amidst those time-defying enzymes. Cheerilee's explanation that ponies could not digest meat didn't seem to fully relax the young ponies.

Cheerilee showed them how the stomach kept pushing on her, and explained how this would tumble around the chewed up food normally, eliminating space while still exposing the entirety of the stomach's contents to acids and enzymes. Then she began to explain what happened to food after that, as it entered the small intestine.

Then Apple Bloom opened her big mouth. "Ms. Cheerilee, if our lesson is on the digestive tract an all, then why did ya just show us the stomach?"

Cheerilee's eyes went wide. "Oh my, you're right Apple Bloom. I completely ignored that fact." Apparently she had made at least one little mistake. She was not able to observe her class, but she was beginning to suspect that she was losing their attention. Staring at nothing but pink on a TV or just a big white ball of a pony that talked at them was surely losing their interest by now.

Twist then made the situation worse. "Oh yeah! And the sth-mall intethtine ithz thuppothed to sthoak up the nutrienthsth! How can we sthtudy that?"

Cheerilee slapped her hoof to her head, making the camera shake a little. I don't know, she thought.

Well there were a few things she thought of right away, although they only had just sprung into her head and she hadn't yet really given them a thought outside of that. They were:
1) Get coughed up and leave the camera behind.
2) Conduct a full-tour of the digestive tract and explain what would happen as best she can.
3) Get digested.

She thought this last one sarcastically. It would take awhile just for the protection potion to wear off.

Cheerilee then began to think of her three options.

Cheerilee had taken precautions for her own safety, but she was pretty sure that it would be impossible for a pony to digest meat. Maybe if the meat had been chewed, but whole meat? Wrapped in tough, thick skin and fur?

There was no way they were going to study the digestive process completely, at least, not first hoof.

The disadvantage of leaving her camera behind was that she could not turn and point at things. If she left it behind and it got stuck in something, or Sweetie's intestines closed around it and blocked out the vision, then the lesson wouldn't be very effective, but who knows? Maybe it would work out.

The disadvantage of letting Sweetie Belle's intestines carry her forward was obviously that this could get disgusting. If Sweetie had used the bathroom before coming to school then the trip might not exactly be filthy, but a lot of the ponies had already been grossed out by Cheerilee being eaten...
1412212112212111.title: Options 1 or 2

1412212112212112.content:
Cheerilee began to feel guilty. If she didn't teach her ponies well enough to help them pass their exams, she was going to be fired, and then what purpose would she have in her life. The worry that she was messing up her lesson, that she hadn't really thought any of this out, was beginning to poison her. She began to think about this more emotionally. She couldn't fail her students. She had to consider the drastic options as well, not for her sakes, but theirs.

Cheerilee had, after all, only said ponies cannot digest meat. That wasn't entirely true. Even the study of this fact was taboo, but there were accounts of ponies who had eaten meat to become stronger for races, and ponies who had turned to meat out of desperation. It was more accurate to say that ponies really, really shouldn't be eating meat, rather than could not. She had taken precautions against digestion for this very reason.

Perhaps she should wait for her potion to wear off afterall... Surely watching her be digested from start to finish, or as far as the camera would stay functioning, would benefit her students and keep their attention. Plus, not being digested was not doing Sweetie Belle any good.

Scootaloo's face pressed into Sweetie Belle's stomach, coughing and spitting. She opened her eyes and had a look of disgust and annoyance on her face. 141321.content:
Ponies can eat ponies.

It’s just a simple fact of life. Of course, outside of warfare, being devoured really isn’t anything anypony usually needs to worry about. It’s typically only legally allowed if you are explicitly willing to be eaten by your predators. Unless you are under the age of 18, in which case, it’s actually up to your legal guardians to make that decision for you. At their discretion, they can freely eat you themselves, or even grant permission for someone else to devour you. As a point of fact, only one of your guardians is required to make that decision, and they don’t have to consult with your other guardians first. This was an important factor in a legal case that was popularly discussed a few years back, in which a stallion sued his wife for devouring their foals during a drunken blackout without consulting him first. The judge ended up ruling in the wife’s favor, and for the rest of the year after that trial, foals all across Equestria became just a little more well-behaved.

But parents aren’t the only legal guardians a foal can have. The definitions of a guardian vary from narrow to broad from region to region, and in many regions, it even includes the foal’s teachers! Such a policy is considered an antiquated holdover from times when Equestria was struggling with overpopulation; it’s been abolished in some places, but maintained in others, typically in the fancier cities that pride themselves on having a high caliber of citizenry, and thus have a vested interest in ‘thinning the herd’ of unpromising students. No town has ever gone and adopted new legislature of that sort in the past few centuries, and most ponies were convinced they never would. Even in the fancier cities, there was mounting political pressure to put an end to the practice of teachers eating their students.

Hence why Ponyville’s latest announcement came as such a shock; Princess Twilight Sparkle herself had intervened in the city council to get a law passed that adds teachers to the list of legal guardians to foals in Ponyville! Twilight’s speech had assured everypony this would merely support the functioning of the school board on a clerical, administrative level, but everypony knew the choice had much deeper implications than that. And since Cheerilee was the only teacher in town, all eyes were on her! All of a sudden, she was known as the mare who was allowed to swallow anybody’s foals whenever she wanted with legal impunity! But of course, poor Cheerilee was more baffled and bewildered by this than anyone else! If there was one thing she could be certain of, it was that this weekend’s parent-teacher conferences were going to be VERY interesting…

Usually nopony showed up to these conferences, but Cheerilee was stunned to see a whole line of ponies leading up to her office this time! Applejack was the first in line; some say she had camped outside the school just to make sure she’d be first. She stomped into the teacher’s office at the first opportunity. “Now, ah don’t mean ta be rude, Miss Cheerilee, but I gotta make one thing VERY clear. Ah don’t care what kinda confangled legal jargon Twilight’s got jostlin’ about in her noggin nowadays, Applebloom AIN’T on the menu!” The mare passionately insisted. “Ah know we call ourselves the ‘apple’ family, but that don’t mean we take kindly to gettin’ eaten! And us Apples helped fund your schoolhouse, don’t you forget!”

“Applejack, please, calm down,” Cheerilee replied. “I assure you, I have no interest in eating your sister…” Applejack seemed to become more apologetic and embarrassed as Cheerilee explained herself, before soon trotting out of the office, satisfied.

Next one in was Rarity. The posh mare was all business. “Alright, let’s just get down to brass tacks. How much will I have to pay you, week by week, to make sure my sister stays off your menu?” She said simply, unfolding a sack of shiny, golden bits. “She’s a straight-A student, or so she tells me. That usually means I get a sizeable discount, no?”

Looking down at those bits, Cheerilee actually felt a little tempted. She did need some more bits to afford school supplies and such… but no, she couldn’t possibly bring herself to extort the mare like that! “Miss Rarity, I appreciate the offer, but I really have no plans to be eating any foals, anyway,” Cheerilee said.

Rarity blinked. “Ooh. Well, that does make things easier, then,” she nodded. “My apologies! I had just assumed… well, in Baltimare, the teachers always asked for a bit of kickback to make it clear certain foals are off-limits.” Rarity soon trotted off as well, but not before giving Cheerilee a 20-bit tip, which she appreciated.

The next few visits proceeded much the same: parents and siblings of her students stopping by and trying to beg or bargain enough to make sure she doesn’t eat her kids. It was kind of demoralizing to have everybody treat her like some kind of glutton who was going to devour her students at the first possible opportunity. Eventually, seeing the writing on the wall, Cheerilee figured she could save time by grabbing a megaphone and walking out of her office to address the line directly. “Please, to everypony here worried that I might devour their child, do not fear. I have no plans to eat anybody’s foals. I just want the rest of this school year to proceed as usual.” That announcement seemed to satisfy the rest of the ponies, and the line dispersed.

Cheerilee hoped that that would be the end of that… but the following monday, she once again noticed ponies acting differently. “Good morning, Miss Cheerilee!” Button Mash said as he walked in, in the most uncharacteristically polite possible tone. He happily plopped down a sizeable chocolate bar on her desk. “I got you a chocolate bar! Mrs. Cocoa Skips, your favorite kind! Just cause you’re the best teacher in the whole world!”

“Uuuh… thank you, Button. Night Wish handed him a telescope and pointed him to a small clearing in a dense forest below, thought the griffon encampment was so close that it was visible to the naked eye. Shining Armor began to count the enemy but Night Wish saved him the trouble.

"Only twelve, sir," said the guardsman. "We outnumber them three to one. We should attack, sir, while we have the element of surprise."

Shining Armor wasn't so sure. The reports had indicated a much greater number, and the ponies had lost the last few battle, so the enemy couldn't have suffered very many casualties. So if the griffon camp was only a detachment, where was the rest of the platoon? It seemed too convenient to Shining Armor. The griffons had no reason to split their forces.

"Sir, they have a prisoner," Night Wish pointed to gold pony being led to the enemy captain by three griffons. "Sir, it's one of our scouts. It's Sun Shower."

Sun Shower had bruises and bloody claw marks all over his body. Stripped of his armor and beaten into submission, Sun Shower followed his griffon captors without resistance. Through the telescope, Shining Armor saw terror in his scouts eyes as threw him at the feet of their captain. The blood drained from Shining Armor's face and his stomach turned with disturbed realization as the griffin captain licked her lips. Sun Shower wasn't a prisoner, he was breakfast.

"Sir, we have to attack now. They're going to eat him!" Night Wish was frantic. "Oh dear Celestia, he's just a kid! HE'S JUST A KID!"

But Shining Armor had to keep his cool. The griffon encampment was an obvious ploy. There was probably a hundred griffon's laying in wait within the surrounding forest. For all Shining Armor knew, Sun Shower was just the griffon's attempt to draw the ponies in. Shining Armor had to thoroughly scout the area before he even considered attack. But, by the time the area could be thoroughly scouted, the scout would be thoroughly digested.

To be eaten by the enemy was the most humiliating death for soldier. To die only to serve the enemies hunger was profound violation, and to be reduced until there was nothing substantial or dignified left to return home was even worse.

Shining Armor had to choose, and quickly. Was to follow his heart and save his soldier, or was he to follow his mind and hold back.

The ponies charged, and reached the griffon camp in the nick of time. Sun Shower was halfway down the enemy captain's throat, but she quickly spit him out when she spotted the oncoming attack. The stallions fought bravely, and it looked like victory was at hand, but Shining Armor's suspicions proved to be well founded.

The pegasi and alicorns were quickly knocked out of the sky and devoured before they had a chance to recover from the impact; many of the earth ponies were able to land a few good hits but they all eventually suffered a similar fate; the unicorns shielded themselves but the griffons swallowed them anyway. Magic would protect the unicorns for a little while but it was only a matter of time before their captor's stomachs won out.

Shining Armour fought desperately when, suddenly, his combatants stepped back to form a wide circle around him. Looking around, the pony captain searched for his troops but, after a few final gulps, nothing remained of his squad but the bulges in griffon bellies. Shining Armor could only watch in horror, as his stallions squirmed as they were slowly digested.

The enemy captain stepped forward with a cruel smile on her face. She was holding Sun Shower by the leg like a great hunk of meat. The saliva soaked scout struggled in the griffon's powerful grip, but to no avail. "All this, your entire squad, just for one measly pony," she said with contempt. "It appears that ponies are less intelligent than we suspected. It seems like food is the only thing you are really good for."

And, as if to demonstrate her point, the griffon captain threw Sun Shower in the air and caught him in her beak. The poor pony squired in her mouth but, after a few quick snaps of her beak, Sun Shower was eaten alive. Sun Shower continued to struggle in the griffin's stomach, but his efforts were only rewarded with a condescending pat from his predator before the griffin returned her attention to Shining Armor. To add insult to injury, the satisfied griffon let out a rancid belch directly into Shining Armor's face.

"I have a message for your princess. Tell her that we griffon's are not unreasonable. We only ask for a few hundred ponies." The griffin licked her lips, savoring Sun Shower's flavor. "Give us enough ponies to farm as livestock and we will have no reason to attack your villages any more. I'm sure the ponies of Canterlot will gladly trade a few low born ponies to keep themselves safe."

Shining Armor shook with anger. The idea of breeding ponies only to be eaten was the most disgusting thing he had ever heard. But what disturbed Shining Armor even more was the thought that the Canterlot ponies would sacrificing others to save their own skins. It disturbed Shining Armor so much because he knew that a lot of the Canterlot ponies WERE that callous. But, there was little Shining Armor could do but deliver the message. He slowly withdrew from the camp and the sated griffons let him past.

"Oh, and please don't send for reinforcements," the griffon captain said before Shining Armor left. "Your armies are making my soldiers fat."

Shining Armor wanted to snap her neck for that, but he couldn't let himself die before he made his report to Celestia. When he returned to his deserted camp, Shining Armor wrote his report and considered whether or not he should request for reinforcements. It would take at least three weeks for them to arrive so there was no saving his lost soldiers, but that didn't mean he should give up the fight just yet. However, after such a devastating defeat, it might be best to return to Canterlot and regroup. Tactics needed to be discussed before rushing into battle, and a discussion wasn't really possible when communicating via carrier pigeon.

Standing over her, Applejack loomed with a hanging tongue dripping saliva onto Apple Bloom's face. She opened wide and let the breadth of her tongue push over the entirety of Apple Bloom's face, making her smell her sister's breath.

"Eww!" Apple Bloom moaned and tried to wiggle away. Applejack mmm'ed and gave her sister another huge lick as her stomach growled for more.

"Can't resist it, aww heavens there's so much flavor!"

Applejack paused to smack her lips as Apple Bloom wiggled out from her legs and got onto her feet, a panicked expression on her face. She looked at the barn door...
1453312121121211.title: Applejack says no.

choices: Applejack goes to do her own thing while Apple Bloom *digests
Applejack says she'll go get help.
14533121211212112.content:
Apple Bloom knew she had to run. She lifted her best foot forward, but Applejack lifted hers as well, and curls it around Apple Bloom's chest and pulls her tight against herself, hugging her sister. Apple Bloom struggled and looked up, seeing Applejack's now cavernous maw looming over her. Applejack's lips were not even an inch away from Apple Bloom, giving her a full stare right down her sister's gullet. For a brief moment she was allowed to see the streamers of saliva connecting her teeth and soft pallet to her tongue, as well as individual droplets of the sticky, pre-digestive slime. A split second of her sister's breath washed over her before the cavern descended down on Apple Bloom, closing tight around her neck.

Apple Bloom still had her eyes open, just in shock and disbelief that this was happening to her, and from her own sister! She blinked, still staring down into her sister's throat.

Is this really how it was going to end for her? Food for her own sister?

"Applejack stop yer eating me!" Apple Bloom shouted, but all she got was a murr and a sudden gulp, as she was pressed into Applejack's tight but powerful throat. It squeezed around her head and clamped her muzzle shut, and Apple Bloom was silenced.

Aww this is just peachy, I'm getting eaten by my sister and I can't even do anything about it!

Apple Bloom struggled against her sister. Applejack's saliva increased and she wiggled against Apple Bloom, both keeping her tight against her body and embracing her sister's attempts at prying out of her mouth. Applejack was enjoying her struggles, finding them playful. Apple Bloom gave up and began to shiver. Applejack continued to wiggle as she gulped down her meal, really enjoying herself as her tongue tasted all her favorite treats in her sister's fur and skin. Apple Bloom's body began to shake harder as her chest and forelegs descended into Applejack's throat. The hot and wet was creating a contrast to the cool air outside, and inspite of herself Apple Bloom's body wanted that warmth on her, her shivering an attempt to heat itself up.

Applejack lifted her head up, the strong pony balancing herself momentarily on her back legs while her forelegs cupped Apple Bloom's blank flanks and pushed hard. The ravenous pony gulped and easily sent those hips into her gullet, with the momentum carrying the rest of the filly and pushed Apple Bloom's face through the groping ring of muscle that accepted her graciously into the steaming, tight hot core of her sister.

Apple Bloom curled up into a little ball, coughing as she tried to adjust to the scent of her sister's stomach. It was both pleasant and unpleasant, the mixture of scents somewhat ineffable.

She opened her mouth and called out, "Darn it Applejack Ah'm yer little sister, what you go and eat me fer?"

Applejack licked her lips and burped, giggling. "Well sorry Apple Bloom... Ah don't know what came over me. Ah don't even rightly think Ah'm sorry! Frankly, yer the tastiest thing Ah ever sent down the hatch, bar none!"

"Well glad to know Ah was good fer something before Ah died," she grumbled. She thought for a moment. Was she really going to perish like this? "Umm... Applejack, now what?"
14533121211212112.title: but Applejack pounces and makes a meal of her s...

choices: She's still a blank flank, albeit a tasty one.
145331212112121121.content:
Applejack stopped to consider this for a moment, and sighed. "Well... yer my sister and Ah love ya, but... Ah dunno. Yer in my stomach, and my stomach is supposed to digest food... and yer in there, and yer my sister, but... if yer in my stomach yer also kinda just food now."

"APPLEJACK!" growled Apple Bloom.

"Oh right, sister stuff. Um..." Applejack looked around nervously, started licking her lips. "Gosh darn it Apple Bloom Ah can still taste ya!" She closed her eyes and sat down, hugging her belly. "It’s like my stomach can taste ya... Ya'll just are gonna have to stay in there. Ah can't bring myself to let ya out when yer just so tasty!"

Apple Bloom blinked, unsure of what would happen to her next. "So that's in then? Ah'm just food now?"

"Uh well not entirely, yer still my sister and Ah love ya... so yer not just food now."

Apple Bloom wiggled kicked at her sister's stomach walls. "Well a lotta good that does me!"

Applejack giggled and apologized, then got back to work making apple juice. Apple Bloom kept trying to talk to her, but Applejack didn't seem interested in talking anymore and started whistling while she did the work of two ponies. Apple Bloom started to get worried. Her skin was tingling and she was thoroughly coated in her sister's digestive slime. A puddle of it surrounded her. She wondered how long it would take for her to digest. She didn't think ponies could digest meat that well, especially if it wasn't chewed. Probably would take a long time. But she was sure it was going to do it all the same. She'd learned from Cheerilee that some deer would, very rarely, eat small creatures to get protein. More often than that they'd eat the skin that sheds off their horns that grow in every year. So the stomach probably was universal at digesting most things, just better at some things than others. Such as fruit and veggies.

Apple Bloom kept entertaining the thought that her situation was getting worse, but every time she rubbed on her back and sides that sat in her sister's juices, she found that her body and fur were still intact. At the very least her skin should be getting raw, or the fur should be coming out. But she seemed to be holding together unnaturally well.

Applejack yawned. "There... all done... guess it’s time for a nap."

Apple Bloom felt Applejack go into the house and into her bed, and Apple Bloom couldn't help but get a little sleepy too, surrounded by all this warmth. She fell asleep eventually as well, and together they slept through the night. In the next morning Apple Bloom was the first to wake up and realize that she was still thoroughly intact, even though the stomach acids still raged against her, trying in vain to break her down. She couldn't believe it! The stomach wasn't able to digest her! Surely it wasn't because ponies didn't eat meat regularly! It must have been a part of her abstract talent, the ability to make and keep things whole! It must work on all kinds of things! In the gloom of her sister's stomach, which took hours to get used to, she looked at her flank.
145331212112121121.title: Applejack goes to do her own thing while Apple ...

choices: Applejack decides she'll try to keep Apple Bloom in there forever.
1453312121121211211.content:
Apple Bloom looked at her blank flank in horror, then looked upwards as her eyes rolled slightly into her head. She didn't say it, but the nastiest swear would she could think of was pantomimed on her lips. "What does a girl have to do to earn her cutie mark around here? Get eaten by everypony in town?"

"Hmm? Pardon?"

Apple Bloom smiled. "Applejack! Yer awake! Get me out of here!"

"Woah Apple Bloom... gosh... fer a moment Ah thought Ah dream't all of that!" Applejack sat up in bed and held her bloated stomach, shaking it. "Huh... That's weird. If Ah didn't digest you, Ah should be starving still, or at least light-headed. But Ah still feel really full and satisfied."

"Ah don't care!" said Apple Bloom. "Ah'm stuck in your stomach and Ah can't stay in here forever!"
1453312121121211211.title: She's still a blank flank, albeit a tasty one.

choices: Applejack decides to try and cough her up.
Applejack decides to go get Twilight.
14533121211212112111.content:
Applejack was feeling a lot better now that she'd spent a day *digesting* Apple Bloom. For whatever reason she was getting nutrition from her without hurting her. And if it didn't work out, she thought, then she'd just eat Apple Bloom again. Simple.

"Alright, we'll figure somethin' out," said Applejack. "Umm, so what are our options? Twilight could teleport you outta there. Or... or Ah could just let nature take its course, wouldn't be a dirty trip since I've had nothing to eat but you."

Apple Bloom still scrunched her face up. "Eeww no. Ah don't care how clean it is that's... We're not doin' that. Besides, you can just try and cough me up."

"Ah suppose so," said Applejack. "Hmm..."
14533121211212112111.title: Applejack decides to help.

choices: She'll go find, see, or think of something that will make her throw up.
They'll just have to push Apple Bloom out the back.
145331212112121121111.content:
Applejack got out of bed and then stared at the floor. "Um... how in the hay do Ah do this?"

"Uh you could try pokin' yer uvula," said Apple Bloom.

"My what? Oh, you mean the throat dangly thing?" asked Applejack.

"Yeah."

Applejack figured she could do that if she was able to swallow her sister whole. So she opened her mouth and poked her uvula with her hoof. Nothing.

"Well shucks... Ah guess Ah don't have much of a gag reflex. Well Ah guess that's kinda good to know."

"Why?"

"Ha, never you mind."

Applejack hmmed and rubbed her head. She put on her stetson from the bed post and began to treat it like a thinking cap.
145331212112121121111.title: Applejack decides to try and cough her up.

choices: But first she heads home to get something to eat.
1453312121121211211111.content:
Applejack slapped her foreleg and hollered. "Well gosh Ah think Ah thought of a winner!"

"Really?" asked Apple Bloom.

Applejack was already on the move, Apple Bloom rocking in Applejack's hanging stomach. "Yup. Gonna go head down to the river."

"Uhh, okay?" asked Apple Bloom, not seeing where this was going.

Applejack headed out of the house and spent the better part of ten minutes galloping to the river, where a mill and water wheel was busy grinding grains. She looked at the water wheel and nodded her head. "This outta get me dizzy in two shakes of a lamb's tail. Hold on Apple Bloom!"

Apple Bloom looked around in her gloomy prison. "Hold onto what now?"

Applejack bucked the wheel and sent it into a crazy spin, the wheel kicking up water in a huge spray down-stream. She hopped onto the wheel--Apple Bloom coughed as the wheel struck her with Applejack's landing--and began to spin with the wheel. Before she knew it, her body had been submerged in the water and then carried back out, only to be repeated again. She was being dunked several times a second, and a horrible nausea overcame her. She began to bitterly think that this was a really damn stupid plan, and begrudged what she would do for her sister that she secretly was going to just try and eat again some other time.

She eventually was flung off of the wheel and hit the ground down stream. She got to her hooves and stammered around, the world spinning around Applejack as her eyes did cartwheels in their sockets. All the weight and pressure in her stomach only upset her more, and then she felt herself heave, coughing Apple Bloom up and causing the filly to roll across the grass. Apple Bloom too was severely nauseated, but with her tummy empty all she could do was lay her head down and try to relax while the world swam around her. Gosh it was bright out!

"Applejaaack Ah hate youuu!"

"Yer welcome," said Applejack before her eyes rolled up into her head and the farm pony passed out right there.

Apple Bloom wasn't sure if she slept or not. For a brief moment she completely lost her sense of time. She realized that she had, at some point, closed her eyes and was now opening them again to the snores of her sister. She got up on her hooves shakily and shook her head. She still felt terrible, but she was okay to walk. Course, she was hungry too now. She gave herself a sniff to see if she needed to wash up. She did smell a little sickly, but mostly, she still smelled of apple treacle tart. Like, enough to make her queazy stomach say 'Yeah, I could go for that.'

She figured she needed to go see Twilight and see if she could sort out this smell of hers.
1453312121121211211111.title: She'll go find, see, or think of something ...

choices: Apple Bloom meets another pony on the way.
14533121211212112111112.content:
Apple Bloom started forward; her little legs felt weak. She figured that, after having spent something like a day without food herself, she probably needed to eat something. But that could wait until she got to Twilight's. The unicorn could probably feed her there anyway.

She started on the path to Ponyville. She didn't worry that her sister was sleeping behind her--this whole area was really safe as long as you stayed out of the forest. Apple Bloom didn't even stop to think that this might not no longer be true, as far as she was concerned.
14533121211212112111112.title: Head's into town straight away.

choices: Apple Bloom meets a whole group of ponies on the way!
145331212112121121111122.content: Apple Bloom stops by a patch of flowers and checks their fragrance. Even though Applejack threw her up, she still smelled absolutely amazing. The flowers didn't smell nearly as appealing as she did.
145331212112121121111122.title: Something else.

choices: The group of ponies don't want her to leave.
The group of ponies decide to follow Apple Bloom to Twilight's.
1453312121121211211111221.content:
Apple Bloom heard some noise from up ahead and looked up. While she was distracted with the flowers, a group of six ponies was walking towards her. She thought she recognized most of them. She felt a little nervous. "Ah'd best just get outta the way," she mumbled and stepped off the road and stood behind a bush. She peered through to watch the ponies go by.

In the group was a sort of minty-green pony that she thought was named Ms. Heartstrings. Next to her was the pony she'd tried to swindle once and forced Applejack to lose two whole bags of apples to, Bon Bon. There was also the black pegasus Thunderlane whom Scootaloo said was "almost half as good as Rainbow Dash", and the pegasus Blossomforth that was said to be "disgustingly bendy." Then there was the pony who stumbled around a lot in the afternoon's and evenings--Berry Punch. Applejack said she was a good customer. Last, there was a brown Earth pony with a hourglass on his flank. Apple Bloom had definitely swindled him before! Apple Bloom wasn't sure what his name was.

As they were walking passed, she heard Heartstrings start sniffing. "What's that smell?" she asked.

"Step in something Lyra?" joked Thunderlane, but Blossomforth began sniffing the air too. "Hmm flowers..."

"You mean those flowers?" asked Bon Bon, pointing the ones Apple Bloom had been smelling.

"No, candied rose petals," said Blossomforth. "They're my favorite. Is someone holding out on me? Bon Bon do you have any candied rose petals?"

"I smell cheesecake!" Lyra said with a little growl and licked her lips. "Oh gosh, I had no idea I was this hungry for cheesecake."

"I smell bread pudding with rum," said Berry Punch. "Do you think Sugarcube Corner has a little stand nearby or something?"

The ponies began to discuss their favorite desserts and sniffing, milling about while looking for the source. Apple Bloom's heart was pounding against her chest. This was bad.

I got to get out of here! she thought. She started thinking of what was the best option for sneaking away when she sensed movement nearby. She looked up and saw that one of the ponies had walked over to her bush and spread the branches, revealing the filly. Lyra stared down at her, smiling and drooling. She sniffed the filly.

"Oh gosh it's you I was smelling!" She levitated Apple Bloom up and set her down on the road side as the other ponies approached, sniffing.

"Why does she smell so good?" asked Berry Punch.

"Umm..." Apple Bloom struggled to think of something to tell them that could keep this from escalating into a... situation. "Ah smelled this way after Ah visited Twilight Sparkle at the library. Ah was just headin' over there again."
1453312121121211211111221.title: Apple Bloom meets a whole group of ponies on th...

choices: Apple Bloom makes a run for it!
Apple Bloom can't get away from them!
14533121211212112111112211.content:
"So soon?" asked Blossomforth. "Because I think Thunderlane wants to keep smelling you."

Thunderlane shot her a dirty look, but then took a surreptitious sniff of the air.

Lyra and Bon Bon moved in on Apple Bloom, sniffing at the filly's hair while Apple Bloom scooted away from them.

"Uh well Ah'd love to stay and chat but Ah should get movin'," she said.

"Is something wrong?" asked Berry Punch, sniffing at Apple Bloom's tail. "You're... acting nervous. We're a bunch of responsible adults, you can trust us...!"

"Responsible...!" laughed the brown Earth pony.

All of them were surrounding her now, sniffing and making "mmm" noises and licking their lips. Apple Bloom figured she knew what was about to happen.
14533121211212112111112211.title: The group of ponies don't want her to leave.

choices: Apple Bloom hides under the bridge.
Apple Bloom leads them through the park.
145331212112121121111122111.content:
Apple Bloom darted between Lyra and Bon Bon and ran down the road towards Ponyville. The other ponies were hot on her tail, some of them with their tongues out and drooling.

"Wait come back I just want to ask you something!" shouted Bon Bon.

"And I really want to eat you!" shouted Lyra, which made Bon Bon hit Lyra with her shoulder.

With intentions made open and clear, the other ponies began running harder after Apple Bloom, with Thunderlane and Blossomforth taking to the air.

"Oh crap oh crap!" Apple Bloom chanted. In a dead run, she probably wasn't going to be able to outrun Thunderlane if he was as fast as she'd heard. And then Lyra could be a problem with her unicorn magic. She was coming up to a small park. A little stream ran through it with a bridge crossing over it. There were also trees, bushes, benches, and a small play ground. Maybe there was a way to lose them in there?
145331212112121121111122111.title: Apple Bloom makes a run for it!

1453312121121211211111221111.content:
Apple Bloom needed to hide, but hiding would do no good if she got spotted while doing it. She needed a way to distract them. She turned her head and looked at the pursuing group of ponies and then feigned a look of joy. "Applejack there ya are! Help mee!"

The group of ponies turned their heads, some of them stopping while others crashed into one another. Apple Bloom laughed and then ran for the river, splashing into the river and ducking under the bridge and out of sight.

"Few! Ah haven't run like that in awhile," she said while trying to catch her breath. She shut up as she heard the ponies run onto the bridge and start talking amongst themselves.

"Did you see which way she went?" asked Bon Bon.

"It's like she disappeared!" said Blossomforth.

"Fly up and see if you two can spot her," said Lyra. "You two keep going and check the rose bushes."

Apple Bloom heard the sound of flapping wings and running hooves. She waited a moment, figuring they had all left in search of her. She sighed.

"Ah ha!" Apple Bloom heard and jumped.
1453312121121211211111221111.title: Apple Bloom hides under the bridge.

choices: Berry Punch pounces and nabs Apple Bloom.
14533121211212112111112211111.content:
Apple Bloom watched as Berry Punch's head appeared from atop the bridge. "Lyra and the others ran off, but I could smell that sweet rum smell for miles." She closed her eyes and flipped her mane, scooting herself off the bridge and splashing into the water on her side. Berry Punch was still smiling as she got onto her hooves, mane sticking to her neck as she hunched down, trotting towards Apple Bloom.

"Ms. You don't wanna eat me, promise!" said Apple Bloom. "Ye don't know where Ah've been!"

"I know where you are going though!" said Berry Punch, hunching down further, getting ready to pounce.
14533121211212112111112211111.title: Berry Punch finds her!

choices: The pegasi see her and give chase!
Lyra and Bon Bon see her and give chase!
145331212112121121111122111111.content:
Apple Bloom stuck her tongue out and then kicked water in Berry Punch's face. The adult pony was used to sticking her face in liquids (thank you very much!) and only grinned with excitement as she started off after Apple Bloom.

Apple Bloom broke the bank of the river and was running back down the road, Berry Punch hot on her trail.

"There she is!" shouted somepony. Apple Bloom looked around.
145331212112121121111122111111.title: Apple Bloom dashes off!

choices: Apple Bloom reasons with Berry Punch.
Berry Punch is going to fill her gut with food and alcohol!
145331212112121121111122111112.content:
Apple Bloom turned herself around started running, working her hooves through the water as best she could. Berry Punch launched herself forward and nabbed Apple Bloom's tail in her mouth, chomping down on the soft hair. She rolled her eyes into her head as she salivated over the tail. Apple Bloom turned her head and stared with shock.

"Oh, now c'mon get off of me!" she said and started kicking water at Berry Punch... The adult pony didn't care though, and gulped. Her lips closed around the base of Apple Bloom's tail, and then widened up over Apple Bloom's rump, her tongue curling up under the filly and pushing on her stomach, lifting her up into a sitting position right on the back of Berry Punch's throat, which held tight onto Apple Bloom's tail. The filly wiggled, trying to keep her balance ontop of the entrance to Berry Punch's digestive system. The Earth pony gulped, Apple Bloom's rump disappearing into the gullet.

"Gosh darn it Ah'm not food!" she shouted and started pushing on Berry Punch's jaw. "Quit bein' a cannibal long enough fer you to get yer head on straight!"

Berry Punch gulped and Apple Bloom's legs were stuffed against her belly. "Yer not gunna stop are ya?"

Gulp. Apple Bloom's neck was now level with Berry's lips. Apple Bloom grimaced and closed her eyes, waiting for it to be over. Berry Punch mmm'ed around the filly who tasted so great, curling her tongue over Apple Bloom's head and gulping hard, the tongue helping to make sure this was the last swallow. The thick bulge in her neck soon disappeared and the oddly satisfying strain on her sternum gave way to a satisfying relief as it returned to normalcy. Her stomach gurgled in joy as the filly slipped butt first into its gastric juices. Apple Bloom oofed as she slipped into the hot sac, curling up into a ball. The filly groaned, embarrassed that she had found herself in a stomach once again, so quickly.

Berry Punch burped and then sighed, staring blankly ahead. "Ooooooo mmmm~ that was so much fun. I haven't had that much fun eating myself sick since... Well I guess the last time Pinkie Pie had a party..."

Apple Bloom had a pouty expression as she sat in the gloom of Berry Punch's gut. "Well Ah'm glad yer satisfied..."

"Really? Well that's sweet of you!" Berry Punch said. "You were so tasty! Really! I doubt the Cake's could make a better bread pudding than you were!" Berry Punch suddenly gasped, a bright expression appearing on her face. "Oh that's a great idea! Wanna go get some bread pudding?!"

Apple Bloom made a look of disgust. "Are you losin' her mind? How can you think of eatin' when Ah'm already in here? Plus ain't ya full?"

Berry Punch shook her head, although Apple Bloom barely felt it from her position. "Oh don't worry, I'll be fine, and you'll get to have some too!"

"... ... Ewwww!" Apple Bloom shook her head.

Berry Punch was already on her way. "I am going to get it with some rum. Have you ever had rum? Well I guess not, since you're just a filly. But you're kind of food now so I don't think it would anything to let you have some rum, seeing as you'll be... Well you know!" Berry Punch giggled.

"Wait yer not really gunna have bread pudding and rum while Ah'm stuck in here?!" Apple Bloom asked, shocked.
145331212112121121111122111112.title: Berry Punch pounces and nabs Apple Bloom.

choices: She is stopped by Berry Punch, dropping from the other side!
Lyra grabs her with her unicorn magic.
14533121211212112111112211112.content:
The pony on the bridge jumped down into the water and shuffled toward Apple Bloom. It was Lyra, and she was smiling with her eyes half-lidded as she approached.

"There you are you little foal!" she chuckled. "I thought I smelled you."

"Now just wait a darn minute," Apple Bloom said nervously, trying to puff herself up and look intimidating, but she couldn't help but back away.

"Do you think you can get away?" asked Lyra.

Apple Bloom glared in defiance, then ran.
14533121211212112111112211112.title: Lyra finds her!

choices: Lyra spirits Apple Bloom home to share with Bon Bon later tonight.
145331212112121121111122111122.content:
Apple Bloom's tiny legs did not fight with the water that well, and before she could get very far, a minty glow appeared around her and Apple Bloom felt herself lifted up out of the water and floated towards Lyra. The unicorn grinned evilly as she licked her lips.

"Finally caught you," she said.

Apple Bloom shook her hooves at Lyra. "Now wait jus' a minute! Ah'm just a little filly why in the world would you wanna eat me?"

"Because you smell amazing!" said Lyra. "And you're just little enough to fit down my throat, I think." She levitated Apple Bloom closer and sniffed the filly. "And now...."
145331212112121121111122111122.title: Lyra grabs her with her unicorn magic.

choices: Lyra is caught by another pony who wants her to cough up *their* filly!
Lyra sneaks away from the park and goes on with her day.
1453312121121211211111221111222.content:
Lyra closed her eyes and opened her mouth nice and wide, sticking her tongue out and cupping the tip. A single bead of drool was perched on the tip of Lyra's tongue, slowly running down onto the bottom of that slimy appendage. "Ahhh!" Lyra sighed as she slowly started to bring Apple Bloom's head toward her maw. Apple Bloom looked on nervously as the tongue wiggled started to curl backwards before straightening out again--it was beckoning her forward. Soon Apple Bloom's chin was above that tongue, which cupped around the filly's neck as Apple Bloom's face sunk in past Lyra's cheeks. Apple Bloom's muzzle pressed into Lyra's squishy throat, and then the lips closed down around her head. Lyra mmm'ed as she suckled Apple Bloom's head like a lollipop. Her teeth worked Apple Bloom for a moment, as if trying to chew out more of her flavor while still recognizing that Apple Bloom didn't deserve anything painful.

Lyra swallowed, her eyes rolling up in her head as the rich taste of a creamy, perfectly baked cheese cake flooded her mouth. The taste of the crust was so intense that Lyra could practically feel herself biting into it, the crunch and flavor mixing with the soft, creamy heaviness of the cake itself. But Apple Bloom's flesh was fine as Lyra's experience was purely mental and the teeth only pressed into Apple Bloom gently. Another gulp brought Apple Bloom's shoulders into Lyra's mouth, the filly's head bulging out the unicorn's throat. The squishy esophagus squeezed Apple Bloom's head and matted her fur and mane.

"Oohhh not again!" Apple Bloom whined.

Lyra lifted her head up and gave a push with her magic, staring at Apple Bloom's dock as it disappeared behind Lyra's view of her own nose. Apple Bloom began to giggle as she felt Lyra's tongue start working her tummy. A growl from Lyra's own tummy dampened Apple Bloom's laughter, and seconds later Lyra swallowed again and pulled Apple Bloom's flanks and thighs into her mouth. Lyra's drool made a seething sound as she took a moment to breathe around her meal, a chilly wave of hair moving down Apple Bloom's dampened belly as the air flowed in and out of Lyra's lungs. Lyra made a tiny swallow, and Apple Bloom felt the unicorn's excess saliva slip past her and get sucked away into the stomach just an inch ahead of her. Lyra lapped over Apple Bloom's legs a few moments longer, her mind filled with cheese cakes, and then she gave a final gulp.

Apple Bloom eeked as she pushed on through the stomach's entrance, the esophagus quickly squirreling away the rest of her tiny body and stashing it in Lyra's voracious stomach. Apple Bloom curled into a ball, blinking in the gloom as she felt something beating on her. Lyra was patting her stomach, a look of blissful satisfaction on her face. The unicorn's eyes were half-lidded and her tongue hung out as far as it would go, dripping saliva into the water every couple of seconds. She started to walk away, head held high with pride now that she'd wolfed down a young filly. As she started up the bank of the river, she gave a satisfied burp.

"That was a good lunch, I need to do this again sometime," she said. "I just hope the next pony is as good as you, kid. Now don't digest too quickly. I expect you to keep me satisfied until tomorrow night." She laughed mischievously.

Oh for pete's sakes it's bad enough everypony wants to eat me but why do they want to digest me too? thought Apple Bloom. Good thing they can't. But now what do I do?
1453312121121211211111221111222.title: Lyra eats Apple Bloom immediately!

choices: Lyra proposes she feeds Apple Bloom to Bon Bon for dinner!
Lyra spends all night trying to digest Apple Bloom.
14533121211212112111112211112222.content:
Lyra's head was still titled skyward as she trotted into town, a few onlookers a little surprised to see her looking so pregnant and wondering why they hadn't noticed until now. She trotted into her home, which she shared with Bon Bon. She licked her lips again as she lay down on her couch, rubbing her tummy and thinking about how good it was going to be to digest such a delicious little morsel... Apple Bloom sat bored inside Lyra's smelly stomach. She didn't have it in her to try and struggle. She was still feeling hungry herself, and her tummy rumbled.

Lyra's eyes perked up. "Oh am I still hungry?" she asked.

"That was me," said Apple Bloom. "Ah didn't catch breakfast."

"Hee hee! Well I managed to catch my lunch just fine!" Lyra laughed hard, her tummy shaking and sloshing Apple Bloom around. "Well I suppose you deserve a last meal. Um you're from that farm right? So what do you want, apples?"

"Ah guess..." said Apple Bloom, and a few moments later three apples popped into the stomach, whole and unchewed. Apple Bloom barely caught the three of them. It would have been gross if they'd fallen into Lyra's digestive acids! Apple Bloom scarfed up the apples and sighed, feeling a lot better with something in her own tummy. 1453312211.content:
Scootaloo’s legs wobbled under her as she tried to balance the package on her back, a package that was almost as big as she was. She was delivering it to Rarity’s boutique from a fabrics store on the other side of town, the delivery being a 10 mile walk in total. She groaned in exhaustion, cursing her tiny wings. If only she could fly, she would’ve been there and back in 5 minutes. But she gritted her teeth, trying to focus on her goal. She’s been thinking of getting a lesson from Rainbow Dash, but she figured, being a wonderbolt now, Dash’s time was probably valuable. So, for the past couple of days, Scootaloo’s been doing random chores for ponies around town, trying to scrounge up enough bits to feel comfortable asking the now famous mare for lessons. But contrary to your first assumption, she doesn’t want flying lessons. No, no. She wants to learn how to eat ponies.

You see, ponies eating other ponies has been a part of the culture for millennia now, and though it has become somewhat less common and acceptable, the archaic laws still remain. Equestria relied on a very prominent caste system - among other things, this meant ponies were allowed to swallow any ponies of the same caste or lower, one of the only restrictions being that if their prey was able to escape their stomach, they couldn’t try again. This is a massive social faux pas in most towns, but Ponyville has an interesting history. Long ago, noble ponies from Canterlot would visit Ponyville to indulge in both their lust and their gluttony, since most of Ponyville’s citizens were peasants and thus weren’t allowed to fight back. Eventually, this caused the citizens of Ponyville to become desensitized, and ponies swallowing other ponies became an important aspect of the town’s unique culture.

In fact, in Ponyville, swallowing another pony was considered a vital part of every pony’s journey to adulthood. This never really concerned Scootaloo, as she was always too focused on getting her cutie mark, but now that she has her mark, it seemed like the next logical step. It’s not like she didn’t have enough role models to turn to...

Ponyville used to ship criminals up to Canterlot for the princesses to deal with, but now that Twilight Sparkle herself had become a princess, she had (hesitantly) taken up the mantle as Ponyville’s “executioner”. Pretty much the punishment for every crime in Ponyville was being swallowed, usually by the one you wronged - and if you were able to escape, you were free to go. Alicorn’s stomachs were inescapable, so naturally, the most heinous criminals were sent for Twilight to deal with herself. Notably, Twilight is one of the few nobles in town that the citizens respect and admire, since she doesn’t swallow or enslave random peasants like most other nobles tend to do in Ponyville.

Applejack does believe in ‘traditional justice’, and thus does swallow ponies that trespass on her farm or steal from her, but nopony Scootaloo knew ate as many ponies as Pinkie Pie does. At the end of almost every one of her parties, Pinkie Pie ends up with as many as three ponies wriggling around in her belly - some of them willing prey, some of them not so willing. She also occasionally swallow random visitors at the bakery, or just random ponies around town. Scootaloo liked Pinkie’s sense of humour, but she also didn’t like the prospect of getting digested, so she tended to avoid the mare.

Even her idol, Rainbow Dash, eats a pony every once in awhile. Apparently, in her words, a diet that includes a pony every once in awhile is vital to maintaining a ‘perfect physique’. Whenever she feels she’s getting a bit too bony, she simply snatches another pegasi out of the sky, and prides herself on the fact that nopony has ever managed to escape her powerful stomach. On the rare occasions Scootaloo does happen to meet up with Rainbow Dash right when she has a bellyful of prey, Rainbow Dash always lets her rub her belly while she takes a nap and digests.

But what tipped Scootaloo over the edge was when Applebloom climbed up into the treehouse with a belly three times its normal size, bragging about how she finally found something she enjoyed doing on her own - eating ponies. They spent the whole day rubbing her belly as a colt from the local dance class squirmed and yelled desperately inside. It took 5 hours for him to finally give up! Ever since then, it was all Scootaloo could think about. Her fantasies were interrupted, however, when she finally arrived at the front Rarity’s boutique.

“What? What do you already need a new dress for?” Scootaloo could hear Rarity yelling. She stopped suddenly, and pressed her ear against the door.

“I was on a date with this pony, and they turned to be a real jackass, so I swallowed them, but they squirmed so much they completely tore my old dress apart!” Scootaloo perked up upon hearing that voice emanating from within the boutique. Rainbow Dash! How convenient. It was just the mare she was looking for. “Hey, it was entirely their fault. I tried to tell them not to wriggle so much.”

“Well, maybe if you didn’t eat them they wouldn’t have been able to ruin your dress in the first place!” Scootaloo stepped softly through the door, slamming the package onto the counter. Rarity smiled at her as she walked in. “Oh, hello, Scootaloo.”

“What are you guys talking about?” Scootaloo asked.

“We were talking about how hard it is to keep making clothing for Rainbow Dash when I have to retake her measurements every month!” Rarity scowled, as she dug through her purse for a few bits to give to Scootaloo. “Thank you, dear.”

“That does sound frustrating,” Scootaloo replied, picking her words slowly and carefully, trying to direct the conversation. “It sounds like such as hassle to eat somepony. Why do you even bother?”

“Because it’s awesome,” Rainbow Dash laughed, simply, at the awkwardly-worded question.

“It’s disgusting and primitive, is what it is!” Rarity complained as she took Dash’s measurements. “The other cities will never take Ponyville seriously if we keep eating each other.”

"Heh, live a little, won’t ya? I can pay you for the dress...” Dash groaned.

“Well, what’s so ‘awesome’ about it?” Scootaloo questioned, ignoring Rarity.

“Oh, it just feels great. And it’s a great way to stay in shape! Plus, some ponies just have it coming to ‘em,” Rainbow Dash explains, thinking back fondly on previous experiences. “And though I’ve never tried it, Fleetfoot has told me that unbirthing feels absolutely perfect.”

“What’s ‘unbirthing’?” Scootaloo asked, genuinely curious.

“It’s something foals shouldn’t be hearing about!” Rarity snapped, interrupting their conversation with a stomp of her hoof, staring daggers at Rainbow Dash. “Ugh! You’re such a bad influence on the poor dear…”

Rainbow Dash rolled her eyes, before turning back to the teen. “So, you’re starting to wonder what it’s like to eat ponies, huh?” Rainbow Dash asked. “I started too at about your age.”

“Oh, yeah! In fact, I was thinking of, uh… buying some lessons?” Scootaloo asked, quietly.

“Oh! You want to learn from me, huh?” Rainbow Dash smiled. “Nah, I’ll teach you for free! Every mare has to learn about all this, sometime or another.”

“Well, whatever you’re going to do, do it outside,” Rarity demanded. “I don’t want drool getting all over my carpet.”

“It’s not drool, it’s saliva,” Rainbow Dash insisted, but walked back towards the door without skipping a beat, waving at the filly. “C’mon, Scoots.” Scootaloo’s heart skipped a beat as she followed after her idol. She couldn’t believe that it was that easy! Dash stopped in a place closer to the town square, with a crowd of ponies flowing around them. Rainbow Dash sized up the random civilians as they passed by. “Alright! Well, I assume you can’t eat anypony yet or you would’ve done it by now, so we’ll start with the basics...”

If they manage to get themselves into a cocoon, no matter how hurt, sick, or near death they are, they will be able to regenerate. Heal themselves from anything that may have happened to them. Derpy Hooves woke up a little late that day. She hadn't gotten any work orders for this day, and so didn't think twice about sleeping in for once. She crawled out of her bed and trotted up to the window to see where the sun was in the sky. It was approaching noon it looked like, and Derpy's tummy grumbled in anticipation of a good breakfast. She went down to her kitchen to look through her food stores, only to find she was running a little low on just about everything. It was about time to go to the market, it seemed. She did have a little bread leftover, so she had toast and jelly before heading out.

Trotting out of her house with her saddlebags secured to her back, she stopped by the mailbox to see if she'd gotten any mail. She did get two letters and looked them over, content to read them there in her yard. Her vision problem sometimes made reading a little hard as she kept skipping over lines and had to start over. Seemed that she was invited to a party today from Pinkie Pie. Well that was nice, but it wasn't until later, so she still had a few options on what she could do for the day. She needed to get groceries, or at least go soewhere to grab a bite to eat... then she could go look for some work.

Derpy had a big, firm, fantastic rear, which seemed to have fat on it that was far more dense than that of other ponies. Derpy was fairly fit and trim looking, but she actually weighed a lot! And it was all because of her tightly packed, firm rear! If it weren't for her eyes, or at least the fact that the stallions of Ponyvilles at least pretended to be gentlecolts most of the time, Derpy would probably have ponies crawling all over her for a piece of her bubble butt.

She giggled at the thought. But anyway, her clumsiness was well known, so, most of the employers around town just sort of juggled Derpy from job to job, and while she never starved, she was tight with her money and didn't buy groceries until she needed them.
